record.dc:title: On Porch of the Cottage
record.dc:description: 1. Miss Abbie Langmaid, Chairman of the Settlement School Committee, 2. Abbie Runyan, 3. Tom McCarter student, 4. Emily Burton, 5. Aunt Lizzie Reagan, 6. Evelyn Bishop. This is the front porch of the Teachers' Cottage.
